note.p: Career: Fellow of University College, Oxford
AssocMaterial: CSAC 81/5/81. Papers deposited in the Museum of the History of Science, Oxford
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1981 vol 27 pp 83-101, plate, by R P Bell
References: E J Bowen, 'Who Founded the R.S.?' in NR 1982-83 vol 37 p 5
Edmund J Bowen, 'The Balliol-Trinity Laboratories, Oxford 1853-1940' in NR 1970 vol 25 pp 227-236
J S Rowlinson, 'The war time work of Hinshelwood and his colleagues' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 161-175
